message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.CV. 

This paper proposes new metrics for evaluating the performance of neural machine translation systems, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also involves the use of machine learning techniques, which suggests that it could also be categorized under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper involves the evaluation of translation quality, which could fall under cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Finally, the paper mentions the use of image captioning as an example, which could suggest a connection to computer vision, and therefore cs.CV (Computer Vision) could also be a possible sub-category.
